Class BaseModel<T extends BaseEntity,ID>

  • java.lang.Object
    • ch.bfh.bti7081.s2016.blue.hv.model.BaseModel<T,ID>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - The entity type.
    ID - The Type of the primary-key field of T.
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ContactModel, DrugOrderModel, DrugsModel, EmergencyContactModel, HealthVisitorsModel, PatientModel, SettingsModel, VisitEventModel, VisitsModel

    public abstract class BaseModel<T extends BaseEntity,ID>
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    BaseModel offering some CRUD operations.
